title: Thermal plant load factor to remain healthy at 70 pc in FY'25 on power demand growth of 6 pc: ICRA
description: ICRA projects a stable outlook for the thermal power segment with a 70% thermal plant load factor expected in FY2025, driven by 6% power demand growth.
